summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2710, for the improvement of Duwamish Avenue, from Juneau Street to the south city limits; being the east and west center lineof Section 28, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by graidng the same, constructing walks, by paving the same with asphalt or other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, together with the necessary headers, and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 31881 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
